channel.title: Nuts on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Nuts on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: All Sweet Nut Cookies
item.description: Sandy’s allsweet nut cookies are fun and easy to make. A great snack for kids after school or anytime. Get the kids to help make these delicious cookies. Sandy’s Allsweet Nut Cookies 1/2 c. margerine softened 2 tsp sugar 1 c. chopped pecans 1 tsp. vanilla 7/8 c. sifted flour 2 c. powdered sugar set aside (for rolling cookies after baking) Allsweet Nut Cookies Directions Cream margarine and sugar together.

item.title: Zucchini Bread Recipe
item.description: Zucchini Bread Recipe Easy Zucchini Quick Bread Recipe is a favorite in the Summer after Harvesting Fresh Zucchini from the Garden. Zucchini Bread with Nuts Too, and even Dried Fruit, Just add to the Recipe. Zucchini Bread Ingredients 3 eggs 2 1/2 c sugar 1 c oil 3 c flour 3 tsp cinnamon 1 tsp salt 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp baking soda 3 tsp vanilla extract 4 c shredded zucchini 1 c chopped nuts (walnuts or pecans) Zucchini Bread Directions Blend together eggs, oil, salt, vanilla, and zucchini.

item.title: Stuffed Pork Loin Recipe
item.description: Stuffed pork loin with fresh raspberry sauce is a wonderful Holiday or Fall entree. The stuffing can be made with either walnuts or pecans. for presentation, slice and shingle onto a platter or tray. Stuffed Pork Loin With Raspberry Sauce Stuffing: 4 c water 2tsp chicken base 1/2 lg. onion diced 2 ribs celery diced 1 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 2 tbsp sage 2 apples, peeled, diced 1/2 stick butter 1 c chopped pecans Place all ingredients above in medium sauce pan.
